are other programs able to do DNS lookups correctly?  Are you using a web proxy (and if so, is it correctly configured in BOTH synaptic AND in System->Preferences->Network Proxy)?

the error message you posted  ("Could not resolve 'archive.ubuntu.com'") suggested DNS issues.  Your pastebin of sources.list looks good.  What does the command ' host archive.ubuntu.com' report (it should list 4 IP addresses)?
